0100111111111001 0100000001011101 0 -> sum: 1001000001010110, cout: 0

0011001011011001 1101110010000111 1 -> sum: 0000111101100001, cout: 1
0101111100001000 1010010110111001 0 -> sum: 0000010011000001, cout: 1
0111010001101100 1110010011111101 1 -> sum: 0101100101101010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
